entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
